com.escape.games.api
Interface ResourceLoader

All Known Implementing Classes:
ContextResourceLoader
public interface ResourceLoader

Ability to obtain resources from the environment. Only be accessible in the Install pipeline.

Author:
escape-llc

Method Detail

createTexture

com.escape.games.resource.Texture createTexture(java.lang.String key)
Create a texture if necessary, based on given key.

Parameters:
key - texture key.
Returns:
Cached texture.

preloadTextures

void preloadTextures(java.lang.String... keys)
Preload the list of textures. If key is already cached, it is skipped.

Parameters:
keys - list of texture keys.

createShader

com.escape.games.resource.Shader createShader(java.lang.String key)
Create a shader if necessary, program based on given key.

Parameters:
key - Shader program name, e.g. "basic".
Returns:
Cached program.

preloadShaders

void preloadShaders(java.lang.String... keys)
Preload the list of shaders. If key is already cached, it is skipped.

Parameters:
keys - list of shader keys.

Parameters:

Returns:

Parameters:

Returns:
